title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 202.2 - Unregistered vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 202.2 - Unregistered vehicles

State Regulations

No motor vehicle shall be permitted on any part of the
authority facilities which is not registered or is not properly equipped for
operation upon the public highways of the State of New York in accordance with
the laws of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
202.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
